long.ru:
Make To-Do lists and more. With the To-Do extension you get a simple popup to capture your ideas, goals, and daily tasks.  
 To-Do is Simple, clean, and beautifully designed with a relaxing theme. Declutter your thoughts so you can focus on your tasks, ideas, and getting things done.  Use To-Do to capture your ideas, goals, daily tasks and stay organized.
